snippet: Two suspects killed two police officers on Sunday at a restaurant and fatally shot a third person at a nearby Walmart before dying in a suicide pact, the authorities said.
abstract: Shooting rampage leaves two Las Vegas police officers dead at pizza restaurant and third person dead at nearby Walmart before two assailants died themselves in suicide pact; attackers, one male and one female, ambushed two police officers, identified as Alyn Beck and Igor Soldo, as they were eating lunch.

byline.original: By ASHLEY SOUTHALL and EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS
byline.contributor: Maria Agreda contributed reporting from Las Vegas.

lead_paragraph: Two suspects killed two police officers on Sunday at a restaurant and fatally shot a third person at a nearby Walmart before dying in a suicide pact, the authorities said.

headline.main: Five Dead in Shooting Rampage in Las Vegas
headline.print_headline: Five Dead, Including Two Police Officers, in Shooting Rampage in Las Vegas
